metadata.title: CVE-2020-35572 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Adminer through 4.7.8 allows XSS via the history parameter to the defaultURI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adminer - 4.8.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adminer package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.1-1').
